title: Here's What You Can Expect From Apple's iOS 16 Update
description:
Are you someone who waits a while before updating your phone out of fear of running into bugs? You're not alone! But thankfully, we have someone in the studio who is participating in the beta version of the upcoming iOS update.
So today, our producer Romeo is going to break down everything you can expect from the next update.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Pionaire Podcasting
